returns._0: identifier of the admin fee claimer role
identifier of the admin fee setter role
address of the network middleware service

claimAdminFee(address,address).details: Only the vault owner can call this function.

params.recipient: account that will receive the fee

params.network: network on behalf of which the reward to distribute

returns._0: first index of the unclaimed rewards

params.rewardIndex: index of the reward distribution using the token

returns.amount: amount of tokens to be distributed
returns.timestamp: time point stakes must taken into account at

returns._0: total number of the rewards using the token by the network

setAdminFee(uint256).details: Only the ADMIN_FEE_SET_ROLE holder can call this function.

returns._0: version of the staker rewards contract

ADMIN_FEE_CLAIM_ROLE().notice: Get the admin fee claimer's role.

ADMIN_FEE_SET_ROLE().notice: Get the admin fee setter's role.

NETWORK_MIDDLEWARE_SERVICE().notice: Get the network middleware service's address.

claimRewards(address,address,bytes).notice: Claim rewards using a given token.

claimable(address,address,bytes).notice: Get an amount of rewards claimable by a particular account of a given token.

claimableAdminFee(address).notice: Get a claimable admin fee amount for a particular token.

distributeRewards(address,address,uint25.notice: Distribute rewards on behalf of a particular network using a given token.

lastUnclaimedReward(address,address,addr.notice: Get the first index of the unclaimed rewards using a particular token by a given account.

rewardsLength(address,address).notice: Get a total number of rewards using a particular token for a given network.

version().notice: Get a version of the staker rewards contract (different versions mean different interfaces).
